verses.verse: And I saw an angel stepping down from the sky who had the key of the bottomless area and a huge chain over his hand.
And he took hold of the dragon (the snake, the original one, who is an accuser and opponent) and locked him up a thousand years.

And he threw him into the bottomless area, closed it, and put a seal up on top of it so that he would not mislead the nations anymore till the thousand years were finished. And after these, it is necessary for him to be released for a short time.

And I saw thrones (and they were seated on them, and judgment was given to them) and the souls of the people whose heads had been cut off with an ax because of what Jesus witnessed and because of the message of God. And anyone who did not bow down to the wild animal, nor his image, and did not receive the mark on their forehead and on their hand, both lived and were kings with the Anointed King a thousand years.
The rest of the dead did not come to life again until the thousand years were finished. This is the return back to life, the first one.

Blessed and sacred is the person who has a part in the return back to life, the first one. Over these people, the death (the second death) doesn't have authority, but they will be priests of God and of the Anointed King and will be kings with Him for a thousand years.
And when the thousand years are finished, the Opponent will be released from his jail.
And he will go out to mislead the nations, the ones in the four corners of the earth, Gog and Magog, to gather them together to a war, whose number is as the sand of the sea.
And they walked up over the width of the earth and surrounded the camp of the sacred people and the city, the one that had been loved. And fire tumbled down out from God from the sky and ate them up.

And the Accuser, the one misleading them, was thrown into the lake of the fire and sulfur, where the wild animal and the fraudulent preacher are. And they will be tortured day and night for the spans of time of the spans of time.
And I saw a great white throne and the One sitting on it, away from whose face the earth and the sky escaped, and a place was not found for them.

And I saw the dead, little and great, that had stood in the sight of God. And scrolls were opened, and another scroll was opened that is of the life. And the dead were judged from the things that had been written in the scrolls regarding their actions.
And the sea gave up the dead in it. And Death and Hell (Hades) gave up the dead in them. And they were judged, each regarding their actions.
And Death and Hell (Hades) were thrown into the lake of the fire. This is the second death.
And if anyone was found that had not been written in the scroll of the life, he was thrown into the lake of the fire.
